topics.body:
Anyone remember the Don Bluth film, "Titan AE"? I just realized how ridiculously similar Mass Effect is to it.

> Alien species loosely inspired by various animals
> Drej look like Geth (and relationship with humans mirrors Geth to Quarrians)
> Drej Starship looks like Reaper
> Inspired by 80's sci-fi
> Humans are generally despised by most other races

!http://c3.thejournal.ie/media/2015/06/mind-blown-6.gif!
